import { useEffect } from "react" import { useSelector } from "react-redux" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { HeaderStyles } from "../../assets/index" const Header = () => { const user = localStorage.getItem("profile") const loggedIn = useSelector((state) => state.loggedIn) useEffect(() => {}, [user]) return (
Buddy-App
    {user || loggedIn ? ( <>
  • Logout
  • Create Bugs
  • View Bugs
  • Create Projects
  • View Projects
  • View Profile
  • Logged In As: {user.name} Role: {user.role}
    • ) : ( <>
  • Sign Up
  • Login
    • )}
) } export default Header
